mdRecord.dcterms:title: 165 Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: White, Hawley C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the east front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon from the southeast lawn. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: The "Perfec" Stereograph. (Trade Mark.) Patented April 14, 1903. Other Patents Pending. H. C. White Co., Publishers. General Office and Works, North Bennington, Vt., U.S.A. Title: 165 Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va. Copyright 1901 by H. C. White Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
